38.1.behavioral_axis: Fights only for what is truly of value; everything else gets ignored.
38.1.shadow_axis: Fights everything by default; drains root energy.

38.2.hd_quote: Opposition that does not transgress normal codes of behavior.
38.2.behavioral_axis: Signals opposition without blowing up the field.
38.2.shadow_axis: Over-politeness that becomes servile and defeats the struggle.

38.3.hd_quote: The ability to sustain through integration with similar forces, thus ensuring the vitality to persevere.
38.3.behavioral_axis: Teams up when others fight the same enemy.
38.3.shadow_axis: Lets others do the fighting, then takes the win.

38.4.behavioral_axis: Investigates which people actually empower the individual struggle.
38.4.shadow_axis: Aggressive to anyone who tries to influence.

38.5.hd_quote: A stage in opposition where one is totally isolated.
38.5.behavioral_axis: Holds the fight alone so the cause can be discovered by others.
38.5.shadow_axis: Feels imprisoned by endless solo struggle.

38.6.behavioral_axis: Holds a struggle no one understands yet; clarity comes later.
38.6.shadow_axis: Perpetual opposition that looks pointless and attracts resistance.
